channel.description: Recent content in Advisory Board on Nimverta

item.title: Prof. Serge Ferrari
item.description: Key Opinion Leader (KOL) in osteoporosis and metabolic bone diseases, Prof. Serge Ferrari is a renowned clinical researcher at the University of Geneva, Switzerland.

item.title: Prof. Alessandro Angelini
item.description: Expert in peptide design and formulation, Co-Founder and CSO at Arzanya, and researcher at the European Center for Living Technology, Ca’ Foscari University of Venice, Italy.

item.title: Prof. Iván Durán
item.description: Expert on rare bone disease and creating research animal models for studying rare bone disease. University of Malaga, Spain.

item.title: Prof. Lothar Seefried
item.description: Leading clinician and researcher in the field of rare bone diseases, metabolic bone disorders, and orthopedic surgery and key opinion leader.

item.title: Prof. Shubhendu Palei
item.description: Expert in chemical biology and synthetic biology, with a focus on the design and development of bioactive molecules, peptide therapeutics, and chemical probes for biomedical applications.
